## Course Description

This course provides an overview of global business blockchain, distributed ledger technologies, and other emerging Web3 applications to students with a business background. Blockchain use cases in technology, business, analytics and enterprise products and institutions from Northern Africa, Sub-Saharan Africa, Latin America, North America, Asia, Europe, and Oceania will be discussed and evaluated. Short-term and long-term social and ethical impact of blockchain based applications will be interpreted.
